channel.title: Adding a $ sign by name? Like a staff icon? Rep++
channel.description:
[b]EDIT:[/b]
Source: Edge4Pk DELTA Client: Edge4Pk DELTA
____________________
I have a donator right set, but when I do ::yell massage the little donator icon doesnt come up beside name
How do I make this show up?
Example:
::yell hey!
$ Billy Bob - Hey
Rep++ for help.

}else if (c.playerRights == 4){
								c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
												+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

for pi ;3

see the <img=0> 1-4 check your cache depending on what client ur using
